doc:
Portland Hoffa https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portland_Hoffa 0 Portland Hoffa (January 25, 1905, Portland, Oregon – December 25, 1990, Los Angeles, California) was an American comedian, actress, and dancer. As with most of her siblings, including sister Lebanon and brother Harlem, she was named for the city where she was born. She is remembered best as the stage and radio partner of her first husband, Fred Allen. Allen hosted several highly successful network radio shows in the 1930s and 1940s, in which Hoffa often participated. Portland_Hoffa ( January_25_,_1905 , Portland , Oregon – December_25_,_1990 , Los_Angeles , California ) was an_American_comedian , actress , and dancer . As with_most of her_siblings , including sister_Lebanon and brother_Harlem , she was_named for the_city where she was_born . She is remembered best as the_stage_and_radio_partner of her_first_husband , Fred_Allen . Allen hosted several highly_successful_network_radio shows in the_1930s_and_1940s , in which Hoffa often participated .
